name: Grove Bear
movement: 40 ft. walking and 30 ft. climbing speed
description: The Grove Bear is a notably strong medium-sized beast characterized by its exceptional physical abilities and adaptability to diverse environments. It has sharp claws and a powerful build, making it a formidable opponent in close combat.
memorable: Its ability to grapple effectively allows it to control its foes, showing surprising tactical prowess for a creature of its low intelligence.
goals: The Grove Bear typically serves as a guardian of natural areas, protecting its territory from intruders.
relations: It may be found in forests and other natural environments, possibly alongside other wildlife.
strengths: Strong melee attacks combined with grappling ability make it a threat in combat.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and social skills limit its interactions and problem-solving capabilities.
attacks: It uses powerful claws to deal slashing damage and grapple opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Grappler ability allows it to maintain control over grappled foes.
senses: The Grove Bear has keen smell, granting it advantage on perception checks that rely on scent.
skills: Its perception skill is fairly good, allowing it to detect intruders effectively.
additional_information: Serves as a guardian of natural areas.
test_queries: medium beast adept at tracking scents
bear with climbing speed and strong claws
bear known for grappling and strong melee attacks
